entries.title_d: Hutt ships have been an increasing threat in the Yavin system. Show them not to mess with the Rebel Alliance.
entries.title: Yavin system: Duty mission: Cripple Hutt activity in sector.
entries.taunt_5: You can run but you can't hide little Rebel!
entries.taunt_2: You were foolish coming here Rebel, you're no match for us!
entries.targets_detected: Tactical Computer: < Vessels fitting hunted ship profile on attack vector, weapon systems armed. >
entries.targets_behind: Tactical Computer: < Be aware, vessels trying to target this ship with their weapon systems. Attack originating direction 180 degrees. >
entries.quest_location_d: Travel to the Yavin 4 system for further orders.
entries.quest_destroy_d: Proceed to these coordinates and terminate any Hutt pirates found.
entries.level_increase: We've detected that more Hutt ships have been sent into the sector.
entries.level_boss_dead: Good work, the gunship has been destroyed. We're still picking up Hutt activity, however. Stand by...
entries.level_boss: Rebel Command: < Stay alert, pilot! Hutt Gunships coming your way... >
entries.found_loc: We are uploading coordinates of suspected Hutt ambushes. Investigate and eliminate all hostiles immedaitely.
entries.dd_boss_taunt_5: Your silly crusade ends here Rebel!
entries.dd_boss_taunt_4: A thousand creds to the man who takes him out!
entries.dd_boss_taunt_3: I'm going to enjoy spacing you.
entries.dd_boss_taunt_2: If you cut your engines, I promise not to harm you.
entries.dd_boss_taunt_1: You killed my men. Now you're mine!
entries.complete: Excellent work, Pilot! The Hutt presence in this sector has been soundly beaten. Return to base!
entries.boss_detected: Rebel Command: < Warning! Enemy commander detected on attack vector! >
